analysis:
Entries in art and design subjects have decreased sharply across the UK over the last five years. The -85.2% change compared to a change of -87.2% in all AS-Level entries over the last five years. Over the same period, the 17-year-old population has changed by approximately -5.1%.

Across the UK, a broadly similar proportion of students achieved the top grades in art and design subjects in 2020 as did so across all AS-Level subjects. A total of 25.7% of pupils achieved A grades in art and design subjects compared to 23.3% for all subjects.
